001    package tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces;
002    
003    
004    /**
005     * IRendererController is the common interface for controlling ad renderers.
006     */
007    public abstract interface IRendererController {
008            /**
009             * Pass the event to ad renderer.
010             *
011             * @param type name of the event
012             * <br/>
013             * <br/>
014             * Available event:<br/>
015             *      EVENT_AD_CLICK          -               click on the ad<br/>
016             */
017            public void processEvent(String type);
018    }
